compatibility.notes: The BSD-3-Clause-LBNL license is permissive and allows for both static and dynamic linking with compatible licenses. Care should be taken when linking with copyleft licenses, as they may impose additional restrictions.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice and disclaimer in all redistributions.
If enhancements are made available, grant a non-exclusive, royalty-free perpetual license for those enhancements.
license.name: BSD-3-Clause-LBNL
obligations: Retain copyright notice and list of conditions in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright notice and list of conditions in binary redistributions.
Obtain written permission for using the names of the University of California, Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, or U.S. Dept. of Energy for endorsement or promotion.
